metaInfo.realizedTypes:
<entityStoreData> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" abstract="true" extends="Entity" name="RootChild"/> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="RootChild" name="ESConfiguration"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="21"/> <!-- Give this singleton a key. --> <field isKey="true" name="name" type="string"/> <!-- We use this field to verify that the passphrase for the encryped data is synchronized between the server and client, and between multiple invocations of the client --> <field name="passphraseTest" type="encrypted"/> <field name="version" type="string"/> <!-- The product key should never change for the lifetime of the product --> <field name="productKey" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="gitrev" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="RootChild" name="CircuitContainer"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="1"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="FilterCircuit"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="CircuitContainer"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="MVProperty"/> <field isKey="true" name="name" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="RootChild" name="FilterCircuit"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="4"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="Filter"/> <componentType cardinality="1" name="BoundCircuit"/> <componentType cardinality="*" name="Property"/> <field cardinality="1" name="start" type="@Filter"/> <field cardinality="?" name="fault" type="@Filter"/> <field isKey="true" name="name" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="3" name="logMask" type="integer"/>

<field cardinality="1" default="2" name="inserterType" type="integer"/>

</entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" abstract="true" extends="InsertNodesFilter" name="SamlInsertFilter">

<field cardinality="1" default="0" name="lifeTime" type="long"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="driftTime" type="long"/> <field cardinality="1" default="11" name="samlVersion" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" name="issuerName" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="securityTokenType" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="Sender Vouches" name="subjectConfirmationMethod" type="string"/>
<field cardinality="1" default="0" name="readableFormat" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="addAttributeStatement" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="Lax" name="layoutType" type="string"/>
<!-- holder-of-key Subject Confirmation key type --> <field cardinality="1" default="none" name="keyType" type="string"/>
<!-- Asymmetric holder-of-key Subject Confirmation --> <field cardinality="1" default="certificateInStore" name="subjectConfirmationKeyType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="subjectConfirmationCert" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${certificate}" name="subjectConfirmationCertAttribute" type="string"/>
<!-- Symmetric holder-of-key Subject Confirmation --> <field cardinality="1" default="generated" name="symmetricSigningKeyType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="symmetric.key" name="generatedSymmetricKeyAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${symmetric.key}" name="symmetricKeyAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="certificateInStore" name="symmetricKeyEncryptionKeyType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="symmetricKeyEncryptionCert" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${certificate}" name="symmetricKeyEncryptionCertAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="256" name="hmacSymmetricKeyLen" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-1_5" name="keyWrapAlgorithm" type="string"/>

name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.saml.SamlAuthNInsertFilter"/> <!-- Override the category to give it a different default --> <field cardinality="1" name="category" type="@Category"> <defaultRef> <key type="CategoryGroup"> <id field="name" value="Filter Categories"/> <key type="Category"> <id field="name" value="authentication"/> </key> </key> </defaultRef> name="directory" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1000" name="maxFileSize" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="500" name="maxNumberFiles" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="includeHeaders" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="includeRequestLine" type="boolean"/> </entityType> <entityType value="com.vordel.circuit.string.StringReplaceFilter"/>
<field cardinality="1" default="" name="sourceAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="" name="destAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="false" name="destAttributeOverride" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="" name="replacementString" type="string"/>
<field cardinality="1" default="STRAIGHT_REPLACE" name="matchMode" type="string"/>
<field cardinality="1" default="" name="straightMatchString" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="" name="regexMatchString" type="string"/>
<field cardinality="1" default="MATCH_FIRST" name="matchBehaviour" type="string"/>
</entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Filter" name="GenerateSignatureFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="21"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.sig.GenerateSignatureFilter"/> <componentType cardinality="1" name="KeyInfoFormat"/>
<!-- Where to place signature --> <field cardinality="1" default="##current##" name="actor" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="appendToRootOrSoapHeader" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="sigLocationXPath" type="^XPath"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="sigLocationType" type="integer"/>
<!-- What to sign --> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="failIfNoNodes" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="*" name="xpathPredicateWhatSign" type="^XPath"/> <field cardinality="1" default="wsu:Id" name="nodesToSignIdAttrName" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="useSamlId" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="strForSaml" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="xpath" name="wsuIdHow" type="string"/> <!-- Enumeration of "xpath|elementSpecification|xpathLegacy" --> <!-- One of wsuIdLocations or wsuIdXPath should be set, chosen from wsuIdHow" --> <field cardinality="*" name="wsuIdElementSpecification" type="^ElementSpecifier"/> <field cardinality="*" name="wsuIdXPath" type="^XPath"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="extractNodesFromMessageAttribute" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="${node.list}" name="extractNodeListAttributeName" type="string"/>
<!-- Signing key type --> <field cardinality="1" default="asymmetric" name="keyType" type="string"/>
<!-- Asymmetric --> <field cardinality="1" default="certificateInStore" name="signingKeyType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="signingCert" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${certificate}" name="signingCertAttribute" type="string"/>
<!-- Symmetric -->
<field cardinality="1" default="generated" name="symmetricSigningKeyType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="symmetric.key" name="generatedSymmetricKeyAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${symmetric.key}" name="symmetricKeyAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="includeSymmetricKeyInMessage" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="certificateInStore" name="symmetricKeyEncryptionKeyType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="symmetricKeyEncryptionCert" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="?" default="${certificate}" name="symmetricKeyEncryptionCertAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="useDerivedKey" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="256" name="hmacSymmetricKeyLen" type="integer"/>
<!-- Algorithms --> <field cardinality="1" default="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1" name="signatureMethod" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#sha1" name="digestAlgorithm" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-1_5" name="keyWrapAlgorithm" type="string"/>
<!-- Advanced --> <field cardinality="1" default="none" name="signatureConfirmationType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="specifyInclusiveNamespaces" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="readableFormat" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" name="attachmentTransform" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="envelopedSignature" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="timestampType" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="timestampLifeTimeSecs" type="long"/> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="additionalItemsToSign" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="Lax" name="layoutType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="insertCarriedKeyName" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="includeTransforms" type="boolean"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Filter" value="attribute"/> </key> </key> </defaultRef> </field> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" abstract="true" extends="Filter" name="HTTPClientFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="3"/> <!-- The following filters are used implicitly, e.g. configured thru this filter --> <componentType cardinality="1" name="ConnectionFilter"/> <!-- Routing -->
<field cardinality="1" default="true" name="storeAndRestoreMessage" type="boolean"/>
<!-- Routing --> <!-- 'direct' options --> <field default="direct" name="routingMode" type="string"/> <!-- 'direct' or 'delegate' --> <field cardinality="?" name="specifiedURL" type="string"/> <!-- Also uses component 'ConnectionFilter' to customize connection --> <!-- 'delegate' options --> <field cardinality="1" name="routingCircuit" type="^FilterCircuit"/>
<!-- Interception Hooks --> <!-- Common Hooks --> <field cardinality="1" name="preMessageCreationCircuit" type="^FilterCircuit"/> <field cardinality="1" name="postMessageCreationCircuit" type="^FilterCircuit"/> <field cardinality="1" name="postRoutingCircuit" type="^FilterCircuit"/>
</entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="HTTPClientFilter" name="OCSPFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="3"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.cert.ocsp.OCSPFilter"/> <field cardinality="1" default="${certificate}" name="certMessageAttribute" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" name="signingKey" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="validateResponse" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" name="validateResponseCertificate" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="1" default="false" name="useNonce" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="-1" name="cacheToUse" type="^Cache"/> <field cardinality="1" default="false" name="recordOutboundTxns" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="true" name="validateWithResponse" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="false" name="validateWithCert" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="true" name="validateWithReqCert" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="300" name="clockSkew" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" value="com.vordel.circuit.net.ConnectionFilter"/> <componentType cardinality="1" name="SaveToFileFilter"/> <field cardinality="?" name="profile" type="^NamedAuthnProfile"/>
<!-- SSL Specific --> <field cardinality="*" name="caCerts" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="*" name="sslUsers" type="^Certificate"/> <field cardinality="1" default="true" name="useRootCerts" type="boolean"/> <field default="FIPS:!SSLv3:!aNULL" name="ciphers" type="string"/> <!-- See OpenSSL "ciphers" manpage --> <!-- set of tokens for advanced SSL options: nosslv2, nosslv3, etc. --> <field cardinality="*" name="ssloptions" type="string"> <defaultValue>nosslv2</defaultValue> <defaultValue>nosslv3</defaultValue> <defaultValue>notlsv1</defaultValue> <defaultValue>notlsv1_1</defaultValue> </field>
<field cardinality="?" default="0" name="sendProxyMode" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="forwardClientHostHeader" type="boolean"/>

default="true" name="handleRedirects" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="false" name="performRetries" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="*" name="retryHTTPRanges" type="^HTTPStatusClass"/> <field cardinality="1" default="5" name="retryCount" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="500" name="retryLatency" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="false" name="slaBreachAsFailure" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="false" name="saveTransactionOnFailure" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="false" name="runPolicyOnConnectionFailure" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="?" name="connectionFailurePolicy" type="^FilterCircuit"/> <field cardinality="?" name="proxyServer" type="^ProxyServer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="0" name="stickyness" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="?" default="unnamed" name="stickyCookieName" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="600000" name="stickyCookieExpiry" type="long"/> <field cardinality="?" default="" name="stickyCookiePath" type="string"/> <field cardinality="?" default="" name="stickyCookieDomain" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Filter" name="SetHTTPStatusCode"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="0"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.net.SetHTTPStatusFilter"/> <field cardinality="1" default="200" name="httpResponseStatus" type="integer"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="SetHTTPStatusCode" name="Reflector"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="0"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.net.ReflectFilter"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="Filter" name="AttributeExtractXPathFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="2"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.attribute.AttributeExtractXPathFilter"/> <field cardinality="1" name="attributeLocation" type="^XPath"/> <field cardinality="1" name="attributeName" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="xpathInterpretation" type="integer"/> <!-- Override the category to give it a different default --> <field cardinality="1" name="category" type="@Category"> <defaultRef> <key type="CategoryGroup"> <id field="name" value="Filter Categories"/> <key type="Category"> <id field="name" value="attribute"/> </key> </key> </defaultRef> </field> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="attributeInContentBody" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="" name="contentType" type="string"/> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" abstract="true" extends="Filter" name="HttpBaseFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="4"/> <field cardinality="1" name="credentialFormat" type="string"/> <field name="removeAuthNHeader" type="boolean"/> <field default="0" name="allowRetries" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" name="repository" type="^AuthnRepositoryBase"/> <!-- Override the category to give it a different default --> <field cardinality="1" name="category" type="@Category"> <defaultRef> <key type="CategoryGroup"> <id field="name" value="Filter Categories"/> <key type="Category"> <id field="name" value="authentication"/> </key> </key> </defaultRef> </field>
<!-- Invalid login attempts (default key is IP address--> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="lock" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="${http.request.clientaddr}" name="lockKey" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="5" name="invalidAttempts" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="timePeriod" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="minute" name="timePeriodUnit" type="string"/>
<!-- Invalid login attempts with the ability to unlock after specified time period --> <field cardinality="1" default="0" name="lockUser" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="6" name="userInvalidAttempts" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="5" name="userTimePeriod" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="minute" name="userTimePeriodUnit" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="30" name="lockTimePeriod" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="minute" name="lockTimePeriodUnit" type="string"/>
<field cardinality="1" name="cacheToUse" type="^Cache"> <defaultRef> <key type="CacheManager"> <id field="name" value="Cache Manager"/> <key type="Cache"> <id field="name" value="Invalid Login Attempts"/> </key> </key> </defaultRef> </field> </entityType> <entityType xmlns="http://www.vordel.com/2005/06/24/entityStore" extends="HttpBaseFilter" name="HttpBasicFilter"> <constant name="_version" type="integer" value="0"/> <constant name="class" type="string" value="com.vordel.circuit.authn.HttpBasicFilter"/> <field cardinality="1" default="1" name="allowClientRetry" type="boolean"/> </entityType> </entityStoreData>

id.value: XML Signature Generation : Sign Saml Assertion

fval.name: body
fval.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <samlp:Response xmlns:samlp="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:protocol" xmlns:saml="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:assertion"
IssueInstant="${saml.response.issueinstant}" ID="${saml.response.id}" Version="2.0"
Destination="${saml.authnrequest.consumer}" InResponseTo="${saml.authnrequest.id}"> <saml:Issuer>${saml.authnrequest.providername}</saml:Issuer> <samlp:Status> <samlp:StatusCode Value="${saml.response.status}" /> </samlp:Status> ${samltoken} </samlp:Response>
